text: ibrahimine addehattinre raksitav cila kalpanakalkeant pariksikkukayum, addehamat niraverrukayum ceyta karyavum (ninnal anusmarikkuka.) allahu (appeal) addehatteat parannu: nan ninne manusyarkk netavakkukayanâ€Œ. ibrahim parannu: enre santatikalilppettavareyum (netakkalakkaname.) allahu parannu: (sari; pakse) enre i niscayam atikramakarikalkk badhakamayirikkukayilla
